00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include "ConditionNumberQualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include <math.h>
00037 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00038 #include "ConditionNumberFunctions.hpp"
00039 
00040 using namespace Mesquite;
00041 
00042 ConditionNumberQualityMetric::ConditionNumberQualityMetric()
00043   : AveragingQM(QualityMetric::LINEAR)
00044   { }
00045 
00046 std::string ConditionNumberQualityMetric::get_name() const
00047   { return "Condition Number"; }
00048 
00049 int ConditionNumberQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00050   { return 1; }
00051 
00052 bool ConditionNumberQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00053                                      size_t handle, 
00054                                      double& fval, 
00055                                      MsqError& err )
00056 {
00057   const MsqMeshEntity *const element = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00058   bool return_flag;
00059   double met_vals[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00060   fval=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00061   const size_t* v_i = element->get_vertex_index_array();
00062     //only 3 temp_vec will be sent to cond-num calculator, but the
00063     //additional vector3Ds may be needed during the calculations
00064   Vector3D temp_vec[6];
00065   const MsqVertex *vertices=pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00066   EntityTopology type = element->get_element_type();
00067   switch(type){
00068     case TRIANGLE:
00069       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00070       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00071         //make relative to equilateral
00072       temp_vec[1]=((2*temp_vec[2])-temp_vec[0])*MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00073       return_flag=condition_number_2d(temp_vec,handle,pd,fval,err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00074       return return_flag;
00075     case QUADRILATERAL:
00076       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00077       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00078       return_flag=condition_number_2d(temp_vec,handle,pd,met_vals[0],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00079       if(!return_flag)
00080         return return_flag;
00081       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00082       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00083       return_flag=condition_number_2d(temp_vec,handle,pd,met_vals[1],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00084       if(!return_flag)
00085         return return_flag;
00086       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00087       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00088       return_flag=condition_number_2d(temp_vec,handle,pd,met_vals[2],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00089       if(!return_flag)
00090         return return_flag;
00091       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00092       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00093       return_flag=condition_number_2d(temp_vec,handle,pd,met_vals[3],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094       fval = average_metrics(met_vals, 4, err);
00095       return return_flag;
00096     case TETRAHEDRON:
00097       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00098       temp_vec[3]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00099       temp_vec[4]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00100         //transform to equilateral tet
00101       temp_vec[1]=((2*temp_vec[3])-temp_vec[0])/MSQ_SQRT_THREE;
00102       temp_vec[2]=((3*temp_vec[4])-temp_vec[0]-temp_vec[3])/
00103         (MSQ_SQRT_THREE*MSQ_SQRT_TWO);
00104       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,fval,err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00105       return return_flag;
00106 
00107     case HEXAHEDRON:
00108         //transform to v_i[0]
00109       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00110       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00111       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[4]]-vertices[v_i[0]];
00112       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[0],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00113       if(!return_flag)
00114         return return_flag;
00115       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00116       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00117       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[5]]-vertices[v_i[1]];
00118       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[1],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00119       if(!return_flag)
00120         return return_flag;
00121       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00122       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00123       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[6]]-vertices[v_i[2]];
00124       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[2],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00125       if(!return_flag)
00126         return return_flag;
00127       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00128       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00129       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[7]]-vertices[v_i[3]];
00130       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[3],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00131       if(!return_flag)
00132         return return_flag;
00133       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[7]]-vertices[v_i[4]];
00134       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[5]]-vertices[v_i[4]];
00135       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[0]]-vertices[v_i[4]];
00136       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[4],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00137       if(!return_flag)
00138         return return_flag;
00139       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[4]]-vertices[v_i[5]];
00140       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[6]]-vertices[v_i[5]];
00141       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[1]]-vertices[v_i[5]];
00142       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[5],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00143       if(!return_flag)
00144         return return_flag;
00145       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[5]]-vertices[v_i[6]];
00146       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[7]]-vertices[v_i[6]];
00147       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[2]]-vertices[v_i[6]];
00148       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[6],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00149       if(!return_flag)
00150         return return_flag;
00151       temp_vec[0]=vertices[v_i[6]]-vertices[v_i[7]];
00152       temp_vec[1]=vertices[v_i[4]]-vertices[v_i[7]];
00153       temp_vec[2]=vertices[v_i[3]]-vertices[v_i[7]];
00154       return_flag=condition_number_3d(temp_vec,pd,met_vals[7],err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00155       fval=average_metrics(met_vals, 8, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00156       return return_flag;
00157 
00158     case PYRAMID:
00159     {
00160       unsigned num_adj;
00161       const unsigned* adj_idx;
00162       return_flag = true;
00163       for (size_t j = 0; j < 4; ++j) // skip fifth vertex (apex)
00164       {
00165         adj_idx = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, j, num_adj );
00166         assert( num_adj == 3 );
00167         
00168         temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[0]]] - vertices[v_i[j]];
00169         temp_vec[1] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[1]]] - vertices[v_i[j]];
00170           // calculate last vect map to right tetrahedron
00171         temp_vec[3] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[2]]] - vertices[v_i[adj_idx[0]]];
00172         temp_vec[4] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[2]]] - vertices[v_i[adj_idx[1]]];
00173         temp_vec[2] = 0.5 * (temp_vec[3] + temp_vec[4]);
00174         
00175         return_flag = return_flag && condition_number_3d( temp_vec, pd, met_vals[j], err );
00176       }
00177       fval = average_metrics( met_vals, 4, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00178       return return_flag;
00179     }
00180     
00181     case PRISM:
00182     {
00183       unsigned num_adj;
00184       const unsigned* adj_idx;
00185       return_flag = true;
00186       for (size_t j = 0; j < 6; ++j) 
00187       {
00188         adj_idx = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( type, j, num_adj );
00189         assert( num_adj == 3 );
00190         
00191         temp_vec[0] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[0]]] - vertices[v_i[j]];
00192         temp_vec[1] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[1]]] - vertices[v_i[j]];
00193         temp_vec[2] = vertices[v_i[adj_idx[2]]] - vertices[v_i[j]];
00194           // map to right tetrahedron
00195         temp_vec[1] += vertices[v_i[adj_idx[1]]];
00196         temp_vec[1] -= vertices[v_i[adj_idx[0]]];
00197         temp_vec[1] *= MSQ_SQRT_THREE_INV;
00198         
00199         return_flag = return_flag && condition_number_3d( temp_vec, pd, met_vals[j], err );
00200       }
00201       fval = average_metrics( met_vals, 6, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00202       return return_flag;
00203     }
00204         
00205     default:
00206        MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00207                       "Unsupported cell type (%ld) for Condition Number quality metric.",
00208                        type);
00209 
00210      fval=MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00211      return false;
00212   }// end switch over element type
00213   return false;
00214 }
00215
